info.title: Zoho Analytics API
info.description: API for managing data in Zoho Analytics workspaces and views.

tags.name: Modeling APIs
tags.description: Modeling APIs manage workspaces, views, columns, and folders, and support copying across or within Zoho Analytics accounts.

post.description: Create a blank workspace in the specified organization.
Copy the specified workspace to another org or within the same org.

parameters.name: workspace-id
parameters.description: ID of the workspace to rename

parameters.name: workspace-id
parameters.description: ID of the workspace to delete

post.description: Create a table in the specified workspace.
This API allows you to create a query table using a SQL SELECT query.

put.description: This API allows you to update an existing query table using a SQL SELECT query.

post.description: This API allows you to create a report (chart/table/pivot) in a workspace.

put.description: This API allows you to update the metadata or design of an existing report.

post.description: This API creates a new view by duplicating an existing one.

put.description: Moves multiple views into a specified folder.

204.description: View deleted and moved to trash.

post.description: Restores a view from trash.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a view from trash.

post.description: Create a folder under a specified workspace to organize views.

put.description: Rename an existing folder in the workspace.

delete.description: Delete a folder from the workspace. Optionally delete views within.

post.description: Set the specified folder as the default folder for a given view type.

put.description: Update the hierarchy of a folder (parent or child) and set its parent if needed.
Reorder a folder by moving it relative to another folder.

post.description: This API allows you to add a new column to the specified view.

put.description: This API allows you to rename a column.

delete.description: This API deletes the specified column from a view.

post.description: This API adds a lookup relationship to a column.

delete.description: This API removes the lookup relationship from a column.

put.description: This API hides the specified columns in a view.
This API shows the specified hidden columns in a view.

post.description: Copy the specified views from one workspace to another workspace.

parameters.name: ZANALYTICS-DEST-ORGID
parameters.description: Id of the organization where the destination workspace is present.

post.description: Copy the specified formulas from one table to another across workspaces.

parameters.name: ZANALYTICS-DEST-ORGID
parameters.description: Id of the organization where the destination workspace is present.

post.description: Create reports for the specified table based on the reference table.

204.description: No Content. Reports were created successfully.

post.description: Auto generate reports for the specified table.

204.description: No Content. Reports were auto generated.

post.description: Auto generate reports for the specified column.

get.summary: Get all variables in a workspace
get.description: Retrieve a list of all variables created in the specified workspace.

200.description: Fetches all variables in the workspace

post.description: Create a new variable in the specified workspace using a CONFIG JSON.

get.summary: Get details of a specific variable
get.description: Fetch metadata and configuration of a variable using its ID in a workspace.

200.description: Returns the variable metadata and configuration details

put.description: Update an existing variable in the specified workspace using the CONFIG JSON.

204.description: Variable updated successfully. No response body.

delete.description: Delete the specified variable from the workspace.

204.description: Variable deleted successfully. No response body.

post.description: Add a new formula column to the specified view.

put.description: Update an existing formula column in the view.

204.description: Formula column updated successfully. No response body.

delete.description: Delete a formula column from the specified view.

204.description: Formula column deleted successfully. No response body.

post.description: Add an aggregate formula column to the specified view.

put.description: Update an existing aggregate formula column in the view.

204.description: Aggregate formula column updated successfully. No response body.

delete.description: Delete an aggregate formula column from the specified view.

204.description: Aggregate formula column deleted successfully. No response body.

post.description: Create an email schedule for a view.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: JSON string representing the schedule configuration.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: JSON string representing the updated schedule configuration.

204.description: Email schedule deleted successfully. No content.

post.description: Manually trigger the specified email schedule.

put.description: Enable or disable the specified email schedule.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: JSON string with schedule status (enabled or disabled).

org-id.name: ZANALYTICS-ORGID
org-id.description: Organization ID (can be obtained using Get Organizations API).

dest-org-id.name: ZANALYTICS-DEST-ORGID
dest-org-id.description: Destination Organization ID (can be obtained using Get Organizations API).

scopes.ZohoAnalytics.modeling.delete: Delete modeling objects in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.modeling.update: Update modeling objects in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.modeling.create: Create modeling objects in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.modeling.all: Full access to modeling objects in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.fullaccess.all: Full access to all Zoho Analytics features.

FOLDERNAME.description: The folder where the table is created

GEOROLE.description: Geo role ID applicable for geolocation columns.

PII.description: Marks the column as containing Personally Identifiable Information.

LOOKUPCOLUMN.description: Lookup configuration if column is a lookup.

TABLENAME.description: The name of the lookup table.

COLUMNNAME.description: The name of the column in the lookup table.

sqlQuery.description: SQL query to construct the query table.

queryTableName.description: Name of the query table to be created.

folderId.description: Id of the folder where the query table has to be created.

sqlQuery.description: New SQL query to be updated.

folderId.description: Id of the folder where the query table has to be moved.

examples.sqlQuery: SELECT Region, SUM(Amount) FROM Sales GROUP BY Region

baseTableName.description: Name of the base table used to create report.

reportType.description: Specifies the type of report to be created.

chartType.description: Specifies the type of chart to be created.

axisColumns.description: Details of the columns like type, column name, and functions used.

filters.description: Filter conditions to be applied to the report.

type.description: Defines the role of the column in the report.

columnName.description: Name of the column used in the report.

operation.description: Function applied to the column. Options vary by data type.

tableName.description: Name of the table the filter column belongs to.

columnName.description: Name of the column used for filtering.

operation.description: Function applied to the column in the filter.

viewName.description: The name of the new view.

viewDesc.description: The description of the new view.

copyWithLookup.description: To copy table with lookup details.

folderId.description: The folder ID where the created view should be placed.

viewIds.description: List of view IDs to be moved.

viewName.description: The new name of the view.

viewDesc.description: The new description of the view.

deleteDependentViews.description: To delete dependent views while deleting a table/querytable.

withDependents.description: To restore the view along with its dependent views. Default value: false.
To remove the view along with its dependents from trash. Default value: false.

parentFolderId.description: Id of the parent folder. Newly created folder will be placed under this folder.

makeDefaultFolder.description: Make the created folder as default. Default value - false.

hierarchy.description: New hierarchy for the folder. (0 - Parent; 1 - Child)

parentFolderId.description: Id of the parent folder. (Mandatory when moving a folder as child)

referenceFolderId.description: Id of the folder that will be used as the reference for the new position.

deleteDependentViews.description: Delete the views along with their dependents present in the folder. Default value - false.

dataType.description: The data type of the column.

isPIIColumn.description: To mark as personal data column. Default is false.

geoRole.description: To specify the geo location type. Required if dataType is GEO.

columnName.description: The new name of the column.

deleteDependentViews.description: If true, deletes the dependent views as well. Default is false.
Delete the dependent views created based on the lookup relation. Default is false.

columnIds.description: List of column IDs to hide or show.

viewIds.description: The ID of the views to be copied.

workspaceKey.description: Secret key to allow copying between organizations.

copyWithData.description: Whether to copy the data along with views.

destViewId.description: ID of the copied destination view.

formulaColumnNames.description: The names of the formula columns to be copied.

workspaceKey.description: Secret key to allow copying formulas across orgs.

CreateSimilarViewsConfig.description: Configuration for creating similar views based on a reference view.

folderId.description: The folder ID where the views will be saved.

copyCustomFormula.description: To copy the custom formulas present in the parent view. Default: false.

copyAggFormula.description: To copy the aggregate formulas present in the parent view. Default: false.

analyseAgain.description: Generate duplicate reports if already generated.

formulaName.description: Name of the formula column to be created

description.description: Updated description of the formula column

deleteDependentViews.description: To delete the column along with dependent views. Default is false

examples.summary: Delete formula with dependent views false

formulaName.description: Name of the aggregate formula column to be created

description.description: Description of the aggregate formula column
Updated description of the aggregate formula column

deleteDependentViews.description: To delete the column along with dependent views. Default is false

examples.subject: Monthly Financial Summary
examples.message: Please find the attached monthly report.

operation.description: To specify the new status for the schedule
